name: Dark Mage's Shade
flavorText: The scrolls in the Yshari Sanctum speak with somber tones of the dark mage Garesh. Could the runes on this hat really mark it as his?
flavorTextHtml: The scrolls in the Yshari Sanctum speak with somber tones of the dark mage Garesh. Could the runes on this hat really mark it as his?

secondary.textHtml: Automatically cast Diamond Skin when you fall below 35% Life. This effect may occur once every 19 seconds. (Wizard Only) [15 - 20]
secondary.text: Automatically cast Diamond Skin when you fall below 35% Life. This effect may occur once every 19 seconds. (Wizard Only) [15 - 20]
